title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

f'(0) = f(0) + 0 + 1 = 3

An equation for the tangent line is y = 3x + 2.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

f'(0) = f(0) + 0 + 1 = 3

An equation for the tangent line is y = 3x + 2.

The student earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

f'(0) = f(0) + 0 + 1 = 3

An equation for the tangent line is y = 3x + 2.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for f''(0)

1 point is earned for the second-degree Taylor polynomial

f ″ (x)= f ′ (x)+1;  f ″ (0)= f ′ (0)+1=3+1=4 P 2 (x)=2+3x+ 4 2! x 2 =2+3x+2 x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@63D5@
